pullRequest.title: fix(nui): `InputSettings:onClose` out-of-bounds crash
pullRequest.bodyText: previously if any of the getBinds() calls returned a non-null but empty list, the game would crash due to an out-of-bounds error

commit.message:
fix(nui): `InputSettings:onClose` out-of-bounds crash

- previously if any of the `getBinds()` calls returned a non-null but empty list, the game would crash due to an out-of-bounds error

nodes.bodyText:
That's the actual fix, the rest is simply formatting.
An alternative here would be to return null. I chose to do nothing instead as there might've been a valid configuration before.
